      • SetFillColor

        public void SetFillColor(int color)
        PDF operator: set fill and other operations color.
        Parameters:
        color - formatted as 0xRRGGBB, no alpha channel. alpha value shall set by ExtGraphicState(ResGState).

        PDF operator: set stroke color.

        PDF operator: set line cap
        Parameters:

      • TextSetRenderMode

        public void TextSetRenderMode(int mode)
        PDF operator: set text render mode.
        Parameters:
        mode -
        0: filling
        1: stroke
        2: fill and stroke
        3: do nothing
        4: fill and set clip path
        5: stroke and set clip path
        6: fill/stroke/clip
        7: set clip path.

      • TextSetFont

        public void TextSetFont(Page.ResFont font,
               float size)
        set text font
        Parameters:
        font - ResFont object created by Page.AddResFont()
        size - text size in PDF coordinate.
